newsitem.title: GREECE: Contractor Proodeftiki has 107pct H1 profit growth.
newsitem.headline: Contractor Proodeftiki has 107pct H1 profit growth.

text.p: Construction firm Proodeftiki said its first half profit rose 107 percent to 435 million drachmas from 210 million in the first half a year earlier.
Turnover grew 75 percent to 2.904 billion drachmas with 2.049 billion coming from projects the company carried out on its own and 855 million from joint venture projects.
"The rise in turnover was coupled with cost containment as net profit margin improved to 15 percent from 12.7 percent in the previous first half," Proodeftiki said.
Liabilities dropped by 588 million drachmas to 1.89 billion, down 23.7 percent, bringing the debt-to-equity ratio down to 27.6 from 40 percent a year ago, it said.
Return on equity improved to 8.3 from 3.4 percent in the previous first half.
